text: I'm not supposed to tell you this but I
will tell you this is my favorite here's
what I do I wash my face in the morning
with a gentle cleanser I will switch to
a more sudsy cleanser in the summer time
when things get a little bit more humid
just to keep my skin clear of acne but
in the winter I'm going to use a very
gentle gel-like cleanser then what I do
is put on eye cream in the morning and
at night then I apply an antioxidant
serum there's multiple different brands
that you can use a lot of them are very
very good finally a really good
moisturizer now you don't have to break
the bank
there are great products you can buy at
the pharmacy don't get something that's
too heavy for your skin if you're young
and don't get something that's too light
if you're older the next thing is
sunscreen every day so I use a tinted
sunscreen it provides a really nice
cover because then I don't have to wear
makeup the nighttime regimen is pretty
similar what I do is use a very gentle
gel based cleanser again apply the same
eye cream then I use a retinol or
retinol this is important because it
actually causes an increase in the rate
of your skin cell turnover what that
means is your top layer of skin is
actually going to be turning itself over
faster your skin looks fresher and it
actually reduces sunspots
fine lines and wrinkles and it's a
fantastic addition to any regimen
